summary: Advance notice of next regular scheduled maintenance day

updates.details: Advance notice of scheduled maintenance day on Tues 11 November 2025. Please plan your work to minimise disruption.

summary: Server nx4.jasmin.ac.uk down to test new configuration.

updates.details: Server nx4 is currently down to test a new configuration. Other NX servers nx1 - nx3 available as normal.
Server nx4 still out of service. nx1.jasmin being investigated for connection problems. nx2 and nx3 should be available as normal.
Advance notice of planned network outage at the RAL site on Wed 10 Sep (05:00-07:00). Please plan your work to minimise disruption.
